title: How to Make an Allergen Free Chocolate Cake

steps.headline: Blend the beans and eggs together.
Add the sugar, baking powder, cocoa, and oil.
Bake for 45 minutes, or until a knife poked into the cake comes out clean.

text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF or 180ºC.  Blend the beans and eggs together.  Add the sugar, baking powder, cocoa, and oil. Blend until smooth. Pour batter into cake pan.  Bake for 45 minutes, or until a knife poked into the cake comes out clean.
